page.title: 16An Average Day
page.content: A survey revealed that children arose between 7:30 and 8:30am and left home between 8:30 and 8:45am to go to school.Parents rising between 5:00 and 10:30am with most about 7:30am. Breakfast was generally cereal,toast and a drink (usually tea or coffee). Mother coped with most household tasks;father dealing with gardening and D.I.Y. A surprising number of fathers (46%) involved with cooking. Most people spent the evening watching T.V.,watching or playing sport,reading newspapers or magazines.A small number of children belonged to Youth Clubs, Brownies, Red Cross etc..Bedtime for children usually 9:30 to 10:30pm with adults retiring a little later. 68% had pets with cats and dogs being the most popular. 30% have set times for meals and 72% eat at the table. Sunday Roast was the favourite meal.
